summary: This document includes a dispatch from Chief, Task Force W to Chief of Station, JMWAVE, regarding the transmittal of fourteen CIA reports and an index. The attachment includes an index of CIA reports with subjects ranging from the Office of the Secretary of the Presidency to lists of Cubans entering the U.S. with false visas. Another attachment details an interview with Ignacio Pla Martinez, a member of the DRE and FUAC, regarding anti-communist activities. A third document refers to the liquidation of the resistance in Sagua la Grande.
title: GYROSE/Operational-Transmittal of CAC Reports and Related Intelligence
